Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Oh, ugh. [stands and looks at meatball in chair] What is this, a meatball? Really? [Stanley laughs]

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: It's always more fun to mess with Dwight with an audience. That was usually Pam so now that she's out I had to find someone else. Turns out that Stanley is quite the comedy fan. But not everything makes him laugh. He has very specific tastes. Through a painstaking process of trial and error, I've found out what he likes. And it's really weird.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Jim, come on! That's so juvenile! What the- [opens drawer full of meatballs]

Quote.Speaker: Stanley
Quote.Text: You've been meatballed! [laughs]

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Ugh.

Quote.Speaker: Stanley
Quote.Text: Are you ready for some meatball?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Aw, man. [Stanley laughs] This is not very clever, Jim.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: I know.

Quote.Speaker: Stanley
Quote.Text: Look for your stapler!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [Dwight finds stapler in giant meatball] Really Jim? Really? Very funny.

Quote.Speaker: Stanley
Quote.Text: [to Phyllis] Oh okay. Good night. [climbs in to Dwight's car] What's the haul?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Thirty-two meatballs.

Quote.Speaker: Stanley
Quote.Text: Good day.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: That idiot's been feeding us for a week.

Quote.Speaker: Stanley
Quote.Text: We'll never have to buy meatballs again.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: [phone rings] Dunder Mifflin. Jessica, hi! How are you? Oh yay, that's so great to hear.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: I'm not going to be one of those exes who can't move on. They have their life and I have mine. I'm taking an Italian class. So far I've learned tortellini, spagettini, linguini... Well it's not so much a class as a restaurant, but I do Monday, Wednesday, Friday from seven to nine.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: I will patch you through right now. You sound really pretty today. Okay.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Jessica! I love you! That's a message from my mom.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: My parents met Jessica and they completely flipped for her so they gave me this old family ring to use on her. I know, whoa! Pump the breaks, Bernard, too early! I get it. I just, you know, I'm just carrying it around, seeing how it feels. I haven't proposed to anyone in years... Mom took the main diamond out, she thought that had more of a my little brother kind of vibe to it, but...

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: [Robert is looking at pictures of a house online] Whoa, looks pretty nice. Got a little bit of a Shining vibe, though.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Oh, who needs a house that size?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Big. Stupid. Pure chump bait.

Quote.Speaker: Robert
Quote.Text: I'm selling the house, actually.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: You know, there's a glare from over here... oh wow, that's magnificent.

Quote.Speaker: Robert
Quote.Text: It's mid-recession in a depressed area of a faltering state and I've got the most expensive house on the market. The one percent are suffering too, people. I wanted it to be my Playboy mansion. A temple to wine, revelry, sex, intrigue... this was hot on the heels of Eyes Wide Shut, mind you. Then I met my wife, she moved in, made it her own. Now she's left me and forced me to sell the place. The ultimate insult? They're calling my speakeasy lounge a rumpus room. [Jim laughs] Does my turmoil amuse you, Jim?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: I'm sorry, I thought you were making a joke.

Quote.Speaker: Robert
Quote.Text: What could you possibly have found funny in what I said? What was the joke you thought you heard?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: I guess I thought you were approaching it with more of a sarcasm than misery. Kind of laughing at your own pain, sad clown thing.

Quote.Speaker: Robert
Quote.Text: Oh yes. How hilarious it is to laugh at clowns, the painted jesters of the dying circus industry. Very funny, Jim. I get it.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Um, I'm getting reports of a serious outbreak of the grumpies in here.

Quote.Speaker: Robert
Quote.Text: A beautiful monster cost me my forties and my dream home. I think I'm entitled to the occasional bad day.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Well, please tell Susan we all say hi.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Dude, what if, since you're feeling grumpy, we all swing by tonight and check out your indoor pool? [Robert laughs]

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Kevin, no.

Quote.Speaker: Robert
Quote.Text: What, as some sort of last hoorah?

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Yeah. All of us in the pool, saying hoorah. Maybe the last one that says hoorah is it.

Quote.Speaker: Robert
Quote.Text: You know I suppose someone should enjoy the place before I hand it over to the staging experts at Remax tomorrow. Let's try this: everyone, tonight, my house, wear a swimsuit. Let's just call it a get-together. And let's say no food.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Hey Oscar, was that you who just created a party out of thin air or was it me?

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: That was you, Kevin.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: It was me.

Quote.Speaker: Meredith
Quote.Text: You going tonight, kiddo? Cause I can give you a lift.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Oh, I don't know, Meredith. It seems like you shouldn't drive maybe ever.

Quote.Speaker: Meredith
Quote.Text: It's no problem. You live right near me.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: How do you know where I live?

Quote.Speaker: Meredith
Quote.Text: Andy followed you home after the Christmas party.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Why?

Quote.Speaker: Meredith
Quote.Text: He wanted to make sure California didn't put it in you.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Oh. Come on.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Wow. Andy's such a weird stalker. Following me home like that when he has a girlfriend? I should get a restraining order. [squeaks]

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: [sticks a hand in the pool] Oh, it is warm.

Quote.Speaker: Cathy
Quote.Text: It's almost too warm.

Quote.Speaker: Gabe
Quote.Text: I'm feeling eighty-two, eighty-two and a half.

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: Oh, so close. Eighty-one.

Quote.Speaker: Gabe
Quote.Text: [to Cathy] Well, we'll say its eight-two and it'll be our secret.

Quote.Speaker: Cathy
Quote.Text: [to Jim] Hey, late guy.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Hey. Wow. Just stopping by. Got another party to go to. A wife and two kids at home party.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Oh.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: DJ Pam Halpert is spinning some serious Radio Disney tonight.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: You're looking at the master of leaving parties early. They key is, you have to make a strong impression, so you want to have a picture taken, you want to say some peculiar non sequitur that people remember, you want to note something unique, a talking point, for later. I don't mean to brag, but New Year's Eve, I was home by nine.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Robert, just wanted to grab you one second. This place is amazing, by the way.

Quote.Speaker: Robert
Quote.Text: You should see the whole thing.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: I bet I should. [takes cell phone photo] That's beautiful, I'm going to email that to you.

Quote.Speaker: Robert
Quote.Text: I'm just about to give the tour.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: All right-

Quote.Speaker: Robert
Quote.Text: Join us. You must see what you were laughing about.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: I must...

Quote.Speaker: Jessica
Quote.Text: [looks at pool] Wow.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: [hides ring] Yeah, it's pretty serious poolage.

Quote.Speaker: Jessica
Quote.Text: [sees Andy's hand in his pocket] What are you doing?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Hmm? Flicking a bug off my wiener. [they both laugh]

Quote.Speaker: Jessica
Quote.Text: Gross. I'm getting a drink. Do you want anything?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: No, I'm good.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: [runs to Andy] Funny how we can be surrounded by people and still feel so lonely. Hi.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Hi.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: How is everything? How's your car?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: It's great. You know. Reliable. Great mileage.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Is that so? How about this weekend we take that sucker to a duck pond or something? Maybe get caught in the rain?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Well, I can't. I'm going skiing with Jessica. you know, a couple of dopes on the slopes.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Oh, like a goodbye trip.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: No. What?

Quote.Speaker: Jessica
Quote.Text: Hey.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Hi.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: I guess Andy isn't totally over his current girlfriend. But, if he was jealous once before then maybe I can make him jealous again. Just not with Robert. He told me he was a ride I wouldn't survive, and I believe him.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Val. You made it.

Quote.Speaker: Val
Quote.Text: Yup, yup.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Uh oh, look at this. Red plastic cup, red plastic cup. How about that?

Quote.Speaker: Val
Quote.Text: You know, you are just as dumb at night.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Mmm. [they clink cups]

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: All right, theres- this would be no problem. I could swim under, one breath.

Quote.Speaker: Jessica
Quote.Text: No, show me.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Okay.

Quote.Speaker: Jessica
Quote.Text: Dive in right here.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: In a minute. In a minute.

Quote.Speaker: Jessica
Quote.Text: Okay. You don't know what you're doing.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: A minute would be cool.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Hey, Dwight Snoot.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: What-

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: What you doing?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I'm relaxing. Scram. [pushes her]

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Ow.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Hey, Stanley. Um, what happened to my pants?

Quote.Speaker: Stanley
Quote.Text: I moved them. Pants only need a chair if there's a person in them.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Where... [finds pants, looks for ring]

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Come on, don't you want to play?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Oh really?

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Yeah.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Yeah, you want to play you little hick? [kicks her in to the pool, Erin screams]

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Whoa.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Dwight! Oh my gosh! Dwight!

Quote.Speaker: Robert
Quote.Text: Here we have the parlor. I imagined people would set down their coats and symbolically their inhibitions. This was the gateway. You enter this room a lawyer, a doctor, a teacher, a judge, but beyond it you're simply a penis, a vagina, hunger, ache. Susan used it as a Pilates studio.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: [sees wine collection] Holy cow!

Quote.Speaker: Robert
Quote.Text: Wine collection.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: How many bottles? Three hundred?

Quote.Speaker: Robert
Quote.Text: [laughs] About twelve hundred. What the hell, grab a bottle. Less inventory for the lawyers.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Toby! Chateau Margaux ninety-five. You know your wine.

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: Well, and you have a... yes, a- d- another chateau.

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: Robert, you are too kind.

Quote.Speaker: Robert
Quote.Text: Oh.

Quote.Speaker: Gabe
Quote.Text: Too kind doesn't begin to cover it.

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: With ammunition like this we are in for quite a night, you and me.

Quote.Speaker: Gabe
Quote.Text: And Gabe-y makes three.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Robert, thank you. Thank you for this. Thank you for all this. This night's been magical.

Quote.Speaker: Robert
Quote.Text: Jim, come see this next room. I think you especially would like it.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Really? Why?

Quote.Speaker: Robert
Quote.Text: I don't know. Maybe not. Just come.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: [Dwight dunks her] Oh!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [laughs] You regret attacking me now, hick? Huh?

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Stop it. Dwight, I was flirting with you. I was trying to use you to make Andy jealous.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I'm not going to help you. Why would you choose me? Because I'm mighty? Because I'm the manliest man in the office? I'll do it. [he picks her up]

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: [giggles] Oh Dwight!

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: [giggles] Stop.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: You stop.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: No, you stop.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: No, you stop.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: [to camera] Is he looking? [shakes her head] Oh. You can stop.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Okay, you can stop.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: No, no, no, he's not looking.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: No, you can stop.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: You can actually stop.

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: Whoa, you guys, I just found this insane engagement ring. Is anyone missing this?

Quote.Speaker: Meredith
Quote.Text: The main stone's missing.

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: I don't know. It looks pretty great to me.

Quote.Speaker: Robert
Quote.Text: I pictured myself here every night eating a leg of mutton, the juices dripping down my bare chest, wiping my fingers on the walls. Then I met the vegan.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Good night.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: [raises wine bottle] To the kitchen!

Quote.Speaker: All
Quote.Text: To the kitchen!

Quote.Speaker: Robert
Quote.Text: To the kitchen. Onward!

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Toby, what's compelling about this is the note of persimmon. Right?

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: Note? It's a symphony.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Okay, you have to join my wine-tasting club.

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: I would love that.

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: Toby, you are playing a dangerous game. Guess I'm through the gateway now, though, right?

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: [to Val] You know, I don't think I've ever been in this exact angle before. I was scared at first, but I like it.

Quote.Speaker: Meredith
Quote.Text: You guys got to try this pool. No top scum, no band-aids. This thing is choice.

Quote.Speaker: Val
Quote.Text: You in?

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Yeah, sure, sure. I'll be right in.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: I've been working out. But, the problem is, I've been building muscle underneath. And that top layer hasn't burned off yet. Awkward stage.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [he and Erin feed each other chips] Ah, mmm. So good. Now take a chip, crush it into my face, really rub the grease around. Do it. Now rub it in. Oh, yeah, that's so good. Ah...

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Andy's not even looking. I think sexy eating is a dead end.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Damn it.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: What is the most romantic possible thing?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: We can get some chicken fights going in the pool.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Dwight, that's just- that's really perfect. Thank you.

Quote.Speaker: Both
Quote.Text: Yes! [they high five and jump in the pool]

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: You're in my way!

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Andy, Dwight and I challenge you and Jess to a chicken fight. Winner take all.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Chicken fight!

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: No thanks.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Dang it! What the heck already?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Hey, Cathy. Chicken fight!

Quote.Speaker: Cathy
Quote.Text: Okay, yeah. Who's going to be my partner? Where's Jim?

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: I'm right here! [gets in pool] Cold. Cold. Come on, Cath.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Yeah- oh!

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: [knocks Cathy off Kevin's shoulders] Yes! Woo!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Woohoo! Yes!

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Dwight, our chemistry is really clicking. We work so well together.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I know. I could just bang you right now.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: He's not looking. [Dwight dumps her in the pool] Hey!

Quote.Speaker: Robert
Quote.Text: I had two bears sewn together to make this king-size. Total waste of two bears.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: To both these bears.

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: To both these bears.

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: Bears.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: To both these bears.

Quote.Speaker: Robert
Quote.Text: When I put in the screening room, I bought three movies: Caligula, Last Tango in Paris, and Emmanuelle 2. Last two movies I actually watched in here Marley and Me and On Golden [bleep] Pond.

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: I mean, it's clearly meant for watching erotic cinema.

Quote.Speaker: Gabe
Quote.Text: Yup. We could watch some right now if you want. I got a Korean film on my iPod if you want to just- if you have the cables.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Kelly, that's a crazy ring you found.

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: Yeah, thanks. I'm really glad I found it.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: I can't believe you're wearing it. Are you not superstitious at all?

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: Shh. Of course I'm superstitious. What are you talking about?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: The ring of a failed marriage might have some sinister energy, right? Am I just being silly?

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: Oh, I don't think you're being silly.

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: Oh God. [takes off ring]

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: You know what, I can just sell it and put the money in the party fund.

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: [snatches ring] Then another woman will get it. We can't allow that. We have to destroy it.

Quote.Speaker: Jessica
Quote.Text: [to Andy] Come on. Let's chicken fight those two.

Quote.Speaker: Val
Quote.Text: [comes up from under water] How was that?

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Okay. Watch my toes. [does hand stand]

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Hey Val. Want a beer? It might taste better than that pool water you've been drinking.

Quote.Speaker: Val
Quote.Text: No, I'm good. Thank you.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Cool.

Quote.Speaker: Val
Quote.Text: Cool. [to Kevin] Does Darryl not swim?

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: That's racist! I don't know. But I would say, by looking at him, no, Darryl does not swim.

Quote.Speaker: Jessica
Quote.Text: [knocks Erin off Dwight's shoulders] Yes!

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Yeah!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [to Erin] Maybe we should take a little break.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Dwight, we've got this. I promise. I will not leave your shoulders, no matter what.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Okay.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: One more?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Yeah!

Quote.Speaker: Jessica
Quote.Text: Yeah! Great! [others cheer and clap]

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Mush, mush, mush! Come on!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Go!

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Go! Okay. Yeah.

Quote.Speaker: Jessica
Quote.Text: Here we go! [knocks Erin over] Yes!

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Yay! [Erin comes back up] Whoa!

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Wow!

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: I cannot believe you're still up!

Quote.Speaker: Jessica
Quote.Text: I cannot believe it either.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: I've got this! [Dwight gasps] Charge! Go! Go! [Dwight sinks]

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: [muffled] Dwight are you okay? Hey, damn it-

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [coughs up water] Erin, did we win?

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Sure. Sure we did.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: You're lying. We didn't win.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Hey, hey, hey Dwight. It's okay. Just rest. Just rest.

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: You've broken up your last couple, you evil ring. Do it. [Meredith sets fire to paper ring boat]

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: We're in the pool!

Quote.Speaker: Meredith
Quote.Text: Shut it, Angela.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Ugh. Same old party, same old people. Am I right? Reminds me of Phyllis's birthday.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Ooh, do not remind me of Phyllis's birthday.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I know. [laughs] But boy, that Erin. She sure is a ripe little tiger, isn't she? Rroww! And to think, I always thought of her as a second Meredith. Respectfully, I don't want us walking into a similar Angela kind of situation.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Mmm.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: So I just want to make sure that you are completely, one hundred percent done with Erin.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Last I checked, I'm with Jessica. And I like to get my monog on. It's monogamy for my hog 'n me.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Not what I asked.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: We're done. Erin and I are over.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: So then you won't mind if tonight I just go crazy on her, just go nuts, rrargh. With sex.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Have at it. Or take it slow. Whatever you guys work out.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [sighs] You're an idiot.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Kelly, that is mine! This is mine! [Val, Erin and Kevin play with pool noodles]

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Uh-uh. Uh-uh.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: No!

Quote.Speaker: Val
Quote.Text: Oh I've got him!

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Cannonball! [jumps in pool] Let's do this!

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: [Erin swims up with ring] Wow.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: So I kind of stepped on this. I think it's yours.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Yeah. Oh wow. How did you know it was mine?

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: The Bernard family seal. Duh.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Duh.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Sorry if your special night was ruined.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Oh, whoa. Whoa, no, it's not a special night.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Oh, you weren't going to do that?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Honestly Erin, I don't know what I'm doing. I... I just... I don't know. Thank you.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Andy's confused. That's not what I was hoping for, but it's not so bad either. I can live with confused. I get confused. I totally get confused.

Quote.Speaker: Robert
Quote.Text: And of course, the pool. The ultimate lubricant for any wild evening. It was here that my parties would have crescendoed into true madness.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: To madness.

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: To madness.

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: To madness. [Robert laughs]

Quote.Speaker: Meredith
Quote.Text: To madness.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Hey, um, I think you parked my car in. Is there any way you can move your van?

Quote.Speaker: Meredith
Quote.Text: Oh, I'm sorry. When I got here, I put my keys in a bowl.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Are you serious?

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: Robert, I want you to know, I'm here to rock with you as late as you want, man.

Quote.Speaker: Gabe
Quote.Text: And that goes double for me. I'll stay even later than you'd like.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: [Toby pours wine into Oscar's mouth] Toby! I am Bacchus, god of wine!

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: And I am Bacchus's friend!

Quote.Speaker: Robert
Quote.Text: Gentlemen, bear witness. While I've been mourning the nights that never were, one of them has been unfolding here before me. This is no get-together. This is a party. [Robert strips, jumps in pool, Gabe and Ryan join him]

Quote.Speaker: All
Quote.Text: Yes! Woohoo! Bravo!

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: And there's my talking point.

Quote.Speaker: Robert
Quote.Text: Yes, that's it. Push yourselves, boys. It's not a party if you don't do something that scares you. I need a breather. Oh. Oh. You two keep going.

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: Hey, he's asleep. We can just leave.

Quote.Speaker: Gabe
Quote.Text: So leave.

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: Two pools. A divider. A bridge. Good choice. It says everything about everything, right Robert?

Quote.Speaker: Kathy
Quote.Text: What's the water like?

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Nice.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Oh, it is warm.

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: Robert's house is, well....I don't mean to sound offensive, but it's like where a basketball player would live.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Oh, Dwight.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Uh huh.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: That feels so good!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Yeah....baby.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: [grunting] Hey, Andy.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Hey.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Dwight gives the best back massages.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Yeah, it sounds like it.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Hey, have you ever been checked for scoliosis?

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: I don't know, why don't you check me Dr. Shrute. [laughing]

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: No, seriously. Your spine is jacked. It's like the devil's cursive.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: You mean more like dangerous curves...

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: You'd be like 8 feet tall if this thing was straightened out...[pushes Erin back to floor]

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Ow!

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: You date a guy, you find out he was engaged to your coworker so you throw cake at him. It's over. You start liking him again so you ask him out with a puppet show. He says no. Then he follows you home to make sure that you don't kiss somebody. Then he ignores you at a pool party? Am I right ladies?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [Erin helps Dwight stretch his inner thighs] Yeah. Oh, yeah. Oooooh, yeah.

Quote.Speaker: Jessica
Quote.Text: You guys ready?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Bring it on guys.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Yeah...

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Let's go before I vomit. [Erin and Dwight enter pool]

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Ready?

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: I'm ready.

Quote.Speaker: Jessica
Quote.Text: Whoo!

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Alright! Here we go.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Ok.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: RAHHH!!!!!!!

Quote.Speaker: Jessica
Quote.Text: Yeah, come on!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Get her! Ruin her! [Andy and Jessica beat Dwight and Erin]

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Hey! High-five!

Quote.Speaker: Jessica
Quote.Text: Yeah!

Quote.Speaker: Jessica
Quote.Text: My brother and I were the chicken fight champions of our swim club growing up. I mean, we beat the Strauss twins. Ok, I guess somebody didn't grow up in west Hartford, Connecticut.

Quote.Speaker: Robert
Quote.Text: This room I liked for the view. I dreamed that I would watch my guests walk to their cars at dawn, their faces flushed with the shame and regret for the choices they made the night before. [laughs]

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: I get that.

Quote.Speaker: Gabe
Quote.Text: Beautiful sentiment.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: To the shame room! [raises bottle]

Quote.Speaker: Gabe
Quote.Text: [Robert laughs] I live in this room.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: [Toby and Oscar swig from wine bottles] Oh, Mineral-ey.

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: Mineral-ey.
